text: the following report contains some
disturbing images just reaching our
hospital cancers and miracle after three
months of war Yemen's healthcare system
never strong is collapsing
sonars main gym hariya hospital keeps
going under severe strain away from
these beds 60% of Yemenis have no access
to medical care
when ahmed cara ahmed a migrant from
ethiopia was caught in an airstrike he
was traveling through yemen to try to
cross into saudi arabia to work the
insides of his lungs were burnt as well
as his skin even breathing is agonizing
Sanaa was captured by Houthis insurgents
from North Yemen last September the
saudi-led coalition backed by a UN
resolution wants to restore the former
government to the capital for the last
three months without invading the
richest Arab countries have been
attacking Yemen the poorest but they
haven't forced the Houthis to give up
the territory and arms they've captured
Muhammad Ali al Houthi is the de facto
president he denies Saudi accusations
that the Houthis are in league with Iran
Saudis biggest rival the Houthis are
part of a largely homegrown fight for
power but the Saudi intervention makes
Yemen's war part of the Middle East's
most significant confrontation between
Saudi Arabia and Iran
all of the people from all the world we
stand with the Yemeni people against
this crisis and you have a big role in
supporting the Yemeni people through
sending the message that the siege is a
war of genocide against the people of
Yemen the economy has virtually
collapsed Sanaa is paralyzed focusing on
survival the saudi-led blockade has
stopped almost all the fuel supplies no
fuel means no mains water or electricity
a tank feeds these taps for 2 hours a
day
layers of war are breaking Yemen in the
last week there have been car bombs
outside mosques in sana claimed by
jihadists who are also fighting the
Houthis since the Saudi bombing started
al Qaeda has taken more territory many
civilians have died in the bombing here
because they live just a tin fence away
from a senior military commander
this is shrapnel from the attack that
destroyed their homes he should offer
damaged copy of the Quran next to his
wrecked house and car and I see the kid
in the ground with his head cut open his
brains out and it was really there's no
words to describe what I saw so how many
how many take kids were they given five
from this family alone
so they were small kid the five who died
he was a 5 year old and his cousin who
was like I think a six year old his two
sisters one of them was beheaded if they
had some people that I had kind of
sympathize with authorities I mean right
now everybody just hates him the Saudis
say they have a clear political
objective in this war to restore the
ousted president and to send a strong
message to the Iranians that they can't
meddle in Saudi Arabia's backyard but
the question is is this the way to
achieve that
at the gym Warrior Hospital in sauna the
doctors say the Saudi blockade stops
them getting all the drugs they need to
